column4: Im sorry to be such a bother... i cant find out how much processor speed my motherboard can handle for an upgrade. The sites arent helping.
you mean overclocking or a new processor?
I want to get a  new processor :)
because mine is 1.5 ghz...
well, it's not so much speed as processor gen
it may take a P4
no, its an AMD board
oh, well, then i'm at a loss there :)
The compatible names are Sempron, Duron, Athlon
any of those should be fine
at any speed
really?
yeah, speed is only how fast the chip is clocked
I see... i just need to figure out whether or not to get another board in the process you see. im very very poor.
you should be fine
I mean, its not a *bad* board is it? it handles 3 gigs of memory, has 8 usb conenctors and boots from usb... i think its pretty decent huh?
heh, 3 GB of memory is nothing these days
but for 70 bucks i'd say it's good :)
I only have 1 ^_^ i didnt know anyone had more than 2
you can get 32 GB on some mobo's
Just as long as i dont plug in a brand new shiny processor and find it underclocked to 1.6 ghz again
holy cow
